string-array.name: educational_quotes
string-array.item: “You can never be overdressed or overeducated.”\n― Oscar Wilde
“Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.”\n― Nelson Mandela
“Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.”\n― Robert Frost
“The mind once enlightened cannot again become dark.”\n― Thomas Paine,
“Only a generation of readers will spawn a generation of writers.”\n― Steven Spielberg
“Intelligence plus character-that is the goal of true education.”\n― Martin Luther King Jr.
“Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.”\n― Aristotle
“Marriage can wait, education cannot.”― Khaled Hosseini, A Thousand Splendid Suns
“The task of the modern educator is not to cut down jungles, but to irrigate deserts.”\n― C.S. Lewis
“The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.”\n― Plutarch
“Study without desire spoils the memory, and it retains nothing that it takes in.”― Leonardo da Vinci
“Education without values, as useful as it is, seems rather to make man a more clever devil.”\n― C.S. Lewis
